items.title: Patient Demographics Management
items.description: Allow patients to view and update their personal demographic information including name, date of birth, contact details, and address.
acceptance_criteria: Patients can log in securely to access their demographic information.
Patients can edit and save demographic details with validation for required fields.
System logs changes to demographic data with timestamps.
non_functional: Data must be stored securely in compliance with HIPAA.
System should respond to demographic update requests within 2 seconds.

items.title: Appointment Booking
items.description: Enable patients to search for available appointment slots and book appointments with healthcare providers.
acceptance_criteria: Patients can view available appointment slots by provider and date.
Patients can book, reschedule, or cancel appointments.
Confirmation notifications are sent via email or SMS after booking.
non_functional: Booking operations should complete within 3 seconds.
System must handle at least 500 concurrent booking requests.

items.title: Common Patient Portal Features
items.description: Provide standard patient portal functionalities such as viewing medical history, accessing lab results, and secure messaging with providers.
acceptance_criteria: Patients can view their past medical history and lab results.
Patients can send and receive secure messages with healthcare providers.
non_functional: Portal uptime must be at least 99.9%.
All data transfers must use TLS 1.2 or higher.

notes: The requirement for 'other common features' is vague; assumed standard portal features like medical history, lab results, and secure messaging. Further clarification needed on additional desired functionalities.
